sections.summary: creative, hardworking designer seeking a full-time desktop job, educated as a graphic artist, past experience in business world as a desktop publisher laying out designs for printed mail and advertisements, in local government designing new websites with graphics for different agencies within the system, and later for the same government printing and reproduction center creating documents to be printed off a press or copiers.
